name: FlashDrive Demo
description:
Demo Download is at the bottom of the page.

Inspired by Mario Kart, Rocket league, and Sonic All Star racing, the aim of FlashDrive is to deliver a kart-racer feel with power-ups, drift, and boost while letting the player choose and customize their vehicle. 

Checkout the Kickstarter-

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1107795359/flashdrivestylized-arcade-racer
